@Acosta Hydroxychloroquine drug promoted by Trump as coronavirus ‘game changer’ increasingly linked to deaths 
-- Fortunately he's determined to use the same rigor in delivering a vaccine. By gutting and ignoring regulations he'll get something out MUCH faster.
